research_projects.title: Dynamic Network Management and Performance Optimization for Smart Talk Beacon’s Security Architecture
research_projects.research_area: Cybersecurity, Internet of Things (IoT) network, attack detection
contributions: Developed a dynamic cybersecurity network management system to optimize Smart Talk Beacon's performance.
Implemented advanced cybersecurity measures for IoT networks, focusing on attack detection.
Detected malicious network traffic, demonstrating the system's practical impact and efficacy in a live IoT environment.

research_projects.title: Multilevel Queue Model for Indian Region Broadcast Network (IRBN) over Satellite
contributions: Developed a system for broadcasting data over satellite networks to support reliable communication in remote areas.
Implemented a multilevel queue model to efficiently manage scheduling and data transmissions, improving broadcast consistency by 40%.
Successfully broadcasted educational content to geographically challenging regions in India where cellular networks are unavailable, earning recognition from ISRO for advancing educational access.

research_projects.title: Enterprise Resource Management System

Ensured seamless project completion, meeting all functional requirements and receiving client recognition for delivering a robust ERP solution that optimized their enterprise operations.
